content.description: 1908 photograph by Lewis Hine of Sadie Pfeifer, one of many children working in a South Carolina cotton millCourtesy of the Library of Congress
content.question: Conditions such as those shown in the photograph contributed most directly to which of the following?

choices.label: A constitutional amendment guaranteeing women the right to vote
Pressure from progressive activists to reform business practices
Political initiatives to reform city governments
Creation of the federal income tax

content.answer: Pressure from progressive activists to reform business practices

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
